body:
Bet365 is the world's biggest sportsbook.

Their model is simple. 

We bet on f'n everything and we often have the best odds.

Seriously, look up second division Russian weightlifting. They'll bet on it, they'll have the best odds, and they'll probably have live vision of it.

Their live sport streaming is no joke too.

That's the summary of why you want to bet there:

1. Great Odds
2. Bet On Everything
3. Brilliant Live Sport Streams

- - -

## **Who Is Bet365?**

The British company are the world's biggest bookie, operating in every pocket of the world.

They make more money than the Queen.

Seriously. Google Denise Coates, or just read her **[Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denise_Coates)**. 

She's a farking baller. 

You think Oprah makes bank? Denise can buy her and still have 7B leftover.

- - -
